issue.title: [C++] Create fragment scanners for csv/parquet/orc/ipc
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17288](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17288). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Once we have the basic scan node ready (with an initial implementation based on in-memory fragments) then we can add over the file-format versions.  We may also want to consider adding JSON support for datasets at this time.
